ygData.subject: Re: Wizards being resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I petition about loseing the first kill and LJ spawned 2 minutes later on a Necro which cast boiling blood ran  , and then we engaged Lj , who do ya think
ygData.messageBody:
Shanna wrote:

> From: "Shanna" <shanna@...>
>
> Hi. We were petitioning regarding a steal killer in the Gorge of King
> Xorbb, and were told by a GM that it's not a violation to steal kills.
> Training to intentionally try and kill is, but stealing no.

I petition about loseing the first kill and LJ spawned 2 minutes later on a Necro which cast boiling blood ran , and then we engaged Lj , who do ya think got the kill ..????

And as For traing people I never do on Purpose, But when There stealing my killing I have to draw allot more( 3-4 red to me to to make sure I get a Kill .. If He jumps them .. We he took all the rest he might as well have these *GRIN* (eg I
train to zone , and A Kill stealer will usually try and pick one off .. you just have to get VERY reds and That way I DID not train him .. he attacked it..

--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
-----------------------------------------------------------
